rows.text: Improves{{quantify|date=January 2012}} contrast ratio by twisting electrode plane layout. Also introduces an optional Advanced True White polarizing film from NEC, to make white look more natural{{quantify|date=January 2012}}. This is used in professional/photography LCDs.{{Citation needed|date=January 2012}}

Wider{{quantify|date=January 2012}} aperture for light transmission, enabling the use of lower-power, cheaper backlights. Improves{{quantify|date=January 2012}} diagonal viewing angle and further reduce response time to 5ms.{{Citation needed|date=January 2012}}

Offer 1.07 billion colors (10-bit color depth).{{Citation needed|date=January 2012}} More possible orientations per sub-pixel (1024 as opposed to 256) and produces a better{{quantify|date=January 2012}} true color depth.
Improved color accuracy, increased resolution and PPI, and greater light transmission for lower power consumption.
